verses.verse: This <S%G5026><s%> <S%G1208>second<s%> <S%G1992>epistle,<s%> <S%G27>beloved,<s%> I <S%G2235>now<s%> <S%G1125>write<s%> unto <S%G5213>you;<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> both <S%G3739>which<s%> I stir <S%G1326>up<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G1506>pure<s%> <S%G1271>minds<s%> by way <S%G1722>of<s%> remembrance: <S%G5280><s%>

That ye may be <S%G3415>mindful<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4487>words<s%> which were spoken <S%G4280>before<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G4396>prophets,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1785>commandment<s%> of <S%G2257>us<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G652>apostles<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> Savior: <S%G4990><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G4226>Where<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1860>promise<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3952>coming?<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G575>since<s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3962>fathers<s%> fell <S%G2837>asleep,<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G1265>continue<s%> <S%G3779>as<s%> they were <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G746>beginning<s%> of the <S%G2937>creation.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> <S%G2309>willingly<s%> are ignorant <S%G2990>of,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> by <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> the <S%G3772>heavens<s%> <S%G2258>were<s%> of <S%G1597>old,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%> <S%G4921>standing<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G5204>water<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1223>in<s%> the water: <S%G5204><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3772>heavens<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1093>earth,<s%> which are <S%G3568>now,<s%> by <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> kept in <S%G2343>store,<s%> <S%G5083>reserved<s%> unto <S%G4442>fire<s%> <S%G1519>against<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G2920>judgment<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G684>perdition<s%> of <S%G765>ungodly<s%> <S%G444>men.<s%>

But, <S%G1161><s%> <S%G27>beloved,<s%> be not <S%G2990>ignorant<s%> <S%G3361><s%> of <S%G5124>this<s%> one <S%G1520>thing,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3391>one<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> is <S%G3844>with<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> a <S%G5507>thousand<s%> <S%G2094>years,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G5507>thousand<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G3391>one<s%> <S%G2250>day.<s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> is not <S%G1019>slack<s%> <S%G3756><s%> concerning his <S%G1860>promise,<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> some <S%G5100>men<s%> <S%G2233>count<s%> <S%G1022>slackness;<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> is <S%G3114>longsuffering<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2248>us-ward,<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1014>willing<s%> that <S%G5100>any<s%> should <S%G622>perish,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> that <S%G3956>all<s%> should <S%G5562>come<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3341>repentance.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> will <S%G2240>come<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> a <S%G2812>thief<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3571>night;<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3772>heavens<s%> shall pass <S%G3928>away<s%> with a great <S%G4500>noise,<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> the <S%G4747>elements<s%> shall <S%G3089>melt<s%> with fervent <S%G2741>heat,<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%> that are <S%G1722>therein<s%> <S%G846><s%> shall be burned <S%G2618>up.<s%>

Seeing <S%G3767>then<s%> that <S%G3956>all<s%> these <S%G5130>things<s%> shall be <S%G3089>dissolved,<s%> what <S%G4217>manner<s%> of persons <S%G1163>ought<s%> <S%G5209>ye<s%> to <S%G5225>be<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> all <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G391>conversation<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2150>godliness,<s%>

Looking <S%G4328>for<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4692>hasting<s%> unto <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3952>coming<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G1223>wherein<s%> <S%G3739><s%> the <S%G3772>heavens<s%> being on <S%G4448>fire<s%> shall be <S%G3089>dissolved,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4747>elements<s%> shall <S%G5080>melt<s%> with fervent <S%G2741>heat?<s%>

Wherefore, <S%G1352><s%> <S%G27>beloved,<s%> seeing that ye look <S%G4328>for<s%> such <S%G5023>things,<s%> be <S%G4704>diligent<s%> that ye may be <S%G2147>found<s%> of <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1515>peace,<s%> without <S%G784>spot,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G298>blameless.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2233>account<s%> that <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3115>longsuffering<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> is <S%G4991>salvation;<s%> even <S%G2532>as<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G27>beloved<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> <S%G1325>given<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%> hath <S%G1125>written<s%> unto <S%G5213>you;<s%>

As <S%G5613><s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> his <S%G1992>epistles,<s%> <S%G2980>speaking<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> these <S%G5130>things;<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2076>are<s%> some <S%G5100>things<s%> hard to be <S%G1425>understood,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> they that are <S%G261>unlearned<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G793>unstable<s%> <S%G4761>wrest,<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> they do <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3062>other<s%> <S%G1124>Scriptures,<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G848>their<s%> <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G684>destruction.<s%>

Ye <S%G5210><s%> <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> <S%G27>beloved,<s%> seeing ye know these things <S%G4267>before,<s%> <S%G5442>beware<s%> <S%G3363>lest<s%> ye also, being led away <S%G4879>with<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4106>error<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G113>wicked,<s%> fall <S%G1601>from<s%> your <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G4740>steadfastness.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G837>grow<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5485>grace,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> in the <S%G1108>knowledge<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4990>Savior<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%> To <S%G846>him<s%> be <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1519>forever.<s%> <S%G2250><s%> <S%G165><s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>
